short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Japanese readability / highlight JLPT vocab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readable Japanese - Enhance Japanese readability and highlight JLPT vocabularies

The extension highlights JLPT vocab with different colors, and adjust text size/color for better readability of Japanese.
It also generates a vocab view ordered by difficulty of vocabularies.
